original_title: How to OxiClean a Broken Heart
overview: While sobbing in a McDonald's parking lot listening to a voicemail from her (now, ex) girlfriend, Jess accepts an invitation for casual sex (re: booty call) and embarks on a period-bloody quest for closure at Hot-Jock-Dave's place.
tagline: Period blood is messy. So are breakups.
title: How to OxiClean a Broken Heart
